mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ezdeploy.projects ( userid, projectname, projectdescription, projecttag, projectversion, dfilename, bfilename ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{projectName}, #{projectDescription}, #{projectTag}, #{projectVersion}, #{dfileName}, #{bfileName} )
